metadata.description: Cross-session memory and context management for AI agents

plugins.name: contextd
plugins.description: Cross-session memory, checkpoint save/resume, and error remediation tracking for AI agents. Uses semantic search over past learnings to provide relevant context.

setup.instructions: Run the setup script to download and install contextd for your platform. Windows is not yet supported - see releases page for manual installation.

windows.message: Windows is not yet supported via the automated installer. Visit https://github.com/fyrsmithlabs/contextd/releases/latest to download manually.
